sentences.sContent: He inspires affection and respect as a man of unquestionable integrity.
sentences.sCn: 作为一个无可争议的正直的人，他赢得了人们的爱戴与尊敬。

synos.tran: 毫无疑问的；确实的；无可挑剔的

trans.tranCn: 毫无疑问的， 无懈可击的
trans.tranOther: If you describe something as unquestionable, you are emphasizing that it is so obviously true or real that nobody can doubt it
